statements: SELECT user_id, performance_score FROM UserPerformanceData
SELECT timestamp, app_id, user_id, performance_score FROM UserPerformanceData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM UserPerformanceData GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM UserPerformanceData WHERE user_id = 1 AND performance_score >= 80
SELECT MAX(performance_score) AS max_score, MIN(performance_score) AS min_score FROM UserPerformanceData
SELECT user_id, performance_score, app_id, timestamp FROM UserPerformanceData WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC, performance_score ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM UserPerformanceData GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_score > 80 ORDER BY avg_score DESC
SELECT DISTINCT app_id FROM UserPerformanceData WHERE performance_score > 90
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM UserPerformanceData GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_records > 5 ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT user_id, MAX(performance_score) AS max_score, MIN(performance_score) AS min_score FROM UserPerformanceData GROUP BY user_id HAVING max_score > 95 AND min_score < 50
SELECT * FROM user_performance_data
SELECT user_id, performance_metric FROM user_performance_data ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT app_id, time_stamp FROM user_performance_data WHERE performance_metric = 'Accuracy'
SELECT user_id, algorithm_name FROM adaptive_learning_algorithms ORDER BY algorithm_id
SELECT * FROM user_performance_data WHERE time_stamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM user_performance_data WHERE performance_metric = 'Accuracy';
SELECT user_id, performance_metric, time_stamp FROM user_performance_data WHERE app_id = 1 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(user_id) AS max_user_id FROM user_performance_data;
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM adaptive_learning_algorithms WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT DISTINCT app_id FROM user_performance_data ORDER BY app_id;
SELECT * FROM UserPerformance;
SELECT user_id, performance_score FROM UserPerformance WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT algorithm_name, algorithm_id FROM LearningAlgorithms ORDER BY algorithm_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, journey_description FROM PersonalizedJourneys WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, algorithm_name, journey_description FROM PersonalizedJourneys JOIN LearningAlgorithms ON PersonalizedJourneys.algorithm_id = LearningAlgorithms.algorithm_id;
SELECT * FROM UserPerformance WHERE performance_score > 90 ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT user_id, performance_score FROM UserPerformance JOIN PersonalizedJourneys ON UserPerformance.user_id = PersonalizedJourneys.user_id WHERE algorithm_id = 1 AND performance_score BETWEEN 80 AND 100;
SELECT DISTINCT algorithm_id, algorithm_name FROM LearningAlgorithms ORDER BY algorithm_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, algorithm_id, journey_description FROM PersonalizedJourneys WHERE algorithm_id IN (2, 3) ORDER BY user_id ASC, algorithm_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score, MAX(performance_score) AS max_score FROM UserPerformance;
SELECT * FROM user_performance_data;
SELECT user_id, app_id, performance_score FROM user_performance_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT algorithm_id, algorithm_name FROM adaptive_learning_algorithms ORDER BY algorithm_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, journey_name, journey_description FROM personalized_learning_journeys WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY journey_name;
SELECT user_id, topic_id, learning_progress FROM user_learning_history WHERE topic_id = 5 AND user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, performance_score, timestamp FROM user_performance_data WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM adaptive_learning_algorithms WHERE algorithm_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY algorithm_name ASC;

SELECT ulh.user_id, plj.journey_name, ulh.topic_id, ulh.learning_progress FROM user_learning_history ulh JOIN personalized_learning_journeys plj ON ulh.user_id = plj.user_id WHERE ulh.learning_progress < 0.5 ORDER BY ulh.user_id, plj.journey_name;
SELECT user_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM user_performance_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(performance_score) > 70 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(topic_id) AS topics_completed FROM user_learning_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(topic_id) >= 5 ORDER BY topics_completed DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserPerformanceData;
SELECT user_id, performance_score FROM UserPerformanceData ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM PersonalizedLearningJourneys WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_name, email FROM User WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT app_name, platform FROM LearningApp WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM UserPerformanceData WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT user_id, algorithm_name FROM AdaptiveLearningAlgorithms WHERE algorithm_type = 'Recommender';
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM User WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, start_date, end_date FROM PersonalizedLearningJourneys ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT app_name, platform FROM LearningApp WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
